page.title: 11Attitudes-My Community
page.content: Seaton Burn is quite a nice village, but sometimes quite boring.Near the top of Seaton Burn there is a recreation ground.You can play tennis football,rounders,golf but mainly cricket. Nearly every night Seaton Burn plays a cricket match.We also have a junior cricket team, and most of the players come from local schools There are four pubs in Seaton Burn,the the Moor House,the Social Club,the Six Mile Inn and opposite the recreation ground is the Drift Inn.Opposite my estate is the High School.I go to this school and I enjoy it. People could improve Seaton Burn by having more youth clubs. I live in Fordley which is between Annitsford and Dudley.There are three parks two of which are welfares.
